title: Games Industry News Roundup- January 23rd, 2024
description: A wise person once said “Ignorance is bliss”. When asked to elaborate, they promptly responded with “huh?” But is ignorance really all that blissful? Sure, by remaining ignorant of everything happening around us we don’t have to confront “the terrors”, but then how will we know the kind of things that make our day good? […]

title: Forces of Fantasy: Wood Elves Faction Review
description: Falcon takes a deep dive into Wood Elves and shares his experience on them so far.

title: Goonhammer Interviews: Snot Goblin Gaming and FutureProof Terrain
description: FutureProof terrain is coming soon, and we're sitting down to talk with the creator, Snot Goblin Gaming.

title: Codex Dark Angels – 10th Edition: Crusade Review
description: We take a deep dive into the Crusade rules in the upcoming 10th Edition Codex: Dark Angels.

title: Detachment Focus: Firestorm Assault Force
description: In this series of articles we take a deep dive into a specific detachment for a faction, covering the faction’s rules and upgrades and talking about how to build around that faction for competitive play. In this article, we’re covering the Firestorm Assault Force Detachment in Codex: Space Marines. The core Codex: Space Marines includes […]

title: How to Paint Everything – Emperor’s Children Chaos Space Marines
description: We take a detailed look into how to paint the Emperor's Children and everything associated with them, from pre-heresy to modern era to 2nd edition Noise Marines.
